metadata.title: CVE-2021-34147 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: The Bluetooth Classic implementation in the Cypress WICED BT stack through2.9.0 for CYW20735B1 does not properly handle the reception of a malformedLMP timing accuracy response followed by multiple reconnections to the linkslave, allowing attackers to exhaust device BT resources and eventuallytrigger a crash via multiple attempts of sending a crafted LMP timingaccuracy response followed by a sudden reconnection with a randomBDAddress.

criterions.comment: bluez-firmware package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
